name: Rift Walker (Rift Haven)
description:
Made with RPG Maker MV
A Medieval RPG with time travelling elements.
There is much to do in Riftania, including Mining, Farming, Quest Completing, Beast Slaying, and Dungeon Crawling!
The game has a custom soundtrack of about 40-50 songs that I made during the process of making the game.
Plans to add content after the final boss eventually!
All future updates will be uploaded to here free for Buyers!
Trailer coming soon!
Demo out NOW!
Still looking for bugs and fixing things all the time.
Still figuring out what XP rate is best (most likely going to lower more in future)
